text: The crew meet up with Sierokarte when a school of Albacore appears before their eyes.
trans: 姬塔一行走出洞窟与榭洛科特等人汇合了。就在这时，无数Albacore出现了。

name: Sierokarte/榭洛科特
text: Hey, guys! I'm so glad you're okay!
trans: 大家~！太好了~你们都平安无事呢~

name: Sig
text: Siero! What in the world is going—
trans: 榭洛酱！到底发生什么事了?
